results.name: Permutation of natural numbers induced when A245704 is restricted to {1} and binary codes for polynomials reducible over GF(2): a(1) = 1, a(n) = A062298(A245704(A091242(n-1))).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10001
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: a(1) = 1, and for n > 1, a(n) = A062298(A245704(A091242(n-1))). [Induced when A245704 is restricted to {1} and binary codes for polynomials reducible over GF(2)].
a(1) = 1, and for n > 1, a(n) = A036234(A245704(A014580(n-1))). [Induced also when A245703 is restricted to {1} and other binary codes for polynomials not reducible over GF(2)].
As a composition of related permutations:
program: for(n=1, 10001, write("b245820.txt", n, " ", A245820(n))); \\ The rest of code can be found in A245704.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 16 2014
